suites.title: Backend API Tests for Employee and Admin Role

tests.title: should submit resignation for an employee
tests.fullTitle: Backend API Tests for Employee and Admin Role should submit resignation for an employee

err.message:
CypressError: `cy.request()` failed on:

http://localhost:8080/api/user/resign

The response we received from your web server was:

  > 401: Unauthorized

This was considered a failure because the status code was not `2xx` or `3xx`.

If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false`

-----------------------------------------------------------

The request we sent was:

Method: POST
URL: http://localhost:8080/api/user/resign
Headers: {
  "Connection": "keep-alive",
  "Authorization": "undefined",
  "user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Cypress/13.17.0 Chrome/118.0.5993.159 Electron/27.3.10 Safari/537.36",
  "accept": "*/*",
  "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate",
  "content-type": "application/json",
  "content-length": 20
}
Body: {"lwd":"2024-12-26"}

-----------------------------------------------------------

The response we got was:

Status: 401 - Unauthorized
Headers: {
  "x-powered-by": "Express",
  "access-control-allow-origin": "*",
  "date": "Wed, 24 Sep 2025 06:30:52 GMT",
  "connection": "keep-alive",
  "keep-alive": "timeout=5",
  "content-length": "12"
}
Body: Unauthorized


https://on.cypress.io/request
